posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: github建网站过程
posts.text: github建网站过程1.新建文章hexo new "文章名" 2.上传文章hexo d 3.启动本地服务端出现 “Hexo is running at http://localhost:4000 . Press Ctrl+C to stop.” 代表启动成功 4.配置博客重点是这几行# Deployment ## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment deploy: type: git repo: git@github.com:zhanghlll/zhanghlll.github.io.git branch: main 美化（选做）访问 https://hexo.io/themes 挑选喜爱的主题，作者一般会提供安装引导，不在此赘述。 5.托管站点 在github上建立私有仓库 在 Hexo 根目录执行（其中 $repository_url$ 替换为你实际的私有仓库 URL） git init git add . git commit -m "init" git branch -M master git remote add origin $repository_url$ git push -u origin master
